sbigtopgm

Updated: 23 January 98
Table Of Contents  

NAME

sbigtopgm - convert an SBIG CCDOPS file to PGM  

SYNOPSIS

sbigtopgm [sbigfile]  

DESCRIPTION

This program is part of Netpbm.

sbigtopgm reads an an image file in the native format used by the Santa Barbara Instrument Group (SBIG) astronomical CCD cameras, and produces a PGM image as output. Additional information on SBIG cameras and documentation of the file format is available at the Web site, http://www.sbig.com/.  

SEE ALSO

pgm  

AUTHOR

John Walker (http://www.fourmilab.ch/), January 1998. This program is in the public domain.
